title: LeaverBustered for not being able to connect to a game because your client crashed
body:
Not only did it black screen and crash after champ select, it then wouldn't allow the retry prompt to fix anything.
Then, after rebooting, your client acknowledged the error and had me send a bug report, and after that I attempted a reconnect and made it just in time to see the game remade without me and I got placed back into 10-minute low-priority queue.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're getting a bugsplat, which occurs when your pc  is failing to render the game from factors like  bad drivers or something else.  Even if the leave isn't intentional, it causes others a negative experience so [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)  won't treat it differently.  

It's important to get this fixed up to prevent anymore penalties as well as get you back in game!  I suggest going over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I've never had said issues... until this client came out

Same, I'm running on the same PC I've been running League on for quite some time now and never had this issue until very recently and this is the first occasion of THIS happening and not being able to play.

This is an isolated incident, and the only variable that changed was on league's end, leaving me to believe it has more to do with that.

If that's the case, then why should the player be punished for League causing a negative player experience.

I TRULY do understand the need for a strict leaverbuster system, and do understand the influx of people who just want to complain, but if there is ANY chance league may have a fault to be causing these incidences I believe there should be a way for players to retroactively appeal for their offenses, as I don't want to be sitting with 10 minute wait times for things I'm out of control of.

I'll even openly admit my 5 minute wait time bust was over my family forcing me to close my client and being pricks about the idea of me finishing a game, but this time I am, to the extent of my knowledge, not at fault here. I'm not asking for a personal appeal here, nor am I asking you to bend the rules for ME, I just think it'd be a useful community feature to have logs for this kind of thing and have a way to talk these issues out instead of having a catch-all blacklist.

My Drivers are always updated and my PC is always in pristine condition, this didn't start happening until season 7. 
You said to let you know if I had any questions and have yet to respond in 28 days.
Or not because this thread has been abandoned. At this point you might as well set up a bot to answer these, if you already haven't.
@Porocles I'd really like to continue discussing this issue so it doesn't become just a bandaid and a "Oh well X is the problem and Y is the solution so do that no excuses."
Just happened to me after it randomly patched. Reset all my settings along with it. Happened in a ranked game so now I have leaver buster. Fun. :/
Some Grade A Bull right there. I'm seriously pissed about these 10-15 minute queues now.
